Content: Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna (SF-J) made field a visit to Punkudutivu area in order to inspect the progress of the ongoing construction work of the housing project at  Punkudutivu on Thursday (15). Army troops in order to uplift the living standards of the needy people in the Jaffna peninsula with the assistance of the National Housing Development Authority (NHDA) are engaged in the house construction project. Secretary of Education in the Northern Province who coordinates the project with the NHDA and Senior Army Officers serving in the area were also present during the inspection tour.
